Articles.Content:
Just downloaded 1.0.4 and installed KIS 1.1.5 and KAS 0.5.2 and when starting the new version for the first time it tells me that KIS and KAS Versions are not supported and that I have to use 1.0.2. instead...? Am I missing something? I have not found any newer version of KIS/KAS

Chris

KSP 1.0.3 and 1.0.4 were only released a short time ago. Lots of mods check what version of KSP they are being run in and display this message if it is not the version they expect. The mods may still work but there may be problems caused by the changes in 1.0.3 and 1.0.4 so I would recommend you go read the last few pages of the mods' threads and see what the status is of updates. If there is no mention of a new version for 1.0.4 then ask, but make sure you check first so you don't annoy anyone...
I deeply apologize for having asked that question. I did not mean to annoy anyone!
I didn't mean you had, just don't go posting in the mods' threads asking for a 1.0.4 update if the last few pages have already been talking about it...
Despite saying they're not supported they do work (mostly?) in 1.04. It's just a warning, not an error.
